评论详情: Used for a costume for a play and I loved it.  I bought a 3x and it fit very well, I'm 6'3" and 250lbs. Definitely recommend.
12 year old used for his Halloween outfit. Nice quality
The jacket stinks like terrible body odor. It was clearly used at a costume party and the pig that used it smelled really disgusting. Shameful both that is was resold and that someone would do that.
I expected this to be cheap Halloween costume material, but it's actually well made.  Only downside is that the buttons are decorative only.

It’s a decent weight, and seems to be well-made. A good deal for the price. I purchased this for use in photography, and the jacket looks “rich.”  I have a similar women’s jacket for my personal use that is heavier, but cost A LOT more. I’m happy with this men’s jacket.

I recently purchased the H&ZY Men Steampunk Vintage Jacket for a Halloween costume, and it was fantastic! The retro Gothic Victorian frock coat design really stands out, making it perfect for a steampunk or Victorian-themed outfit. There is functional pockets and the material is great weight but not thick. The quality of the material is impressive, with intricate details that add to its authenticity.  The fit was true to size, and it was comfortable to wear throughout the evening. I received numerous compliments on the jacket and how it completed my look. Whether for a costume party or a themed event, this jacket is a great choice for anyone looking to make a statement. Highly recommended!
This Gothic style jacket was affordable and made my husband’s Halloween costume look cooler. He’s about 5’9 and weighs about 162 pounds and I bought the medium and it fit perfectly
This jacket was the perfect fit for a Victorian gothic attire speakeasy event.  Fit was true to size and well made for the money. With a quick steam the creases from shipping came right out.
Fast delivery and as described
... and it's on me for not confirming!  It doesn't button close.

Overall this thing is workable. It is made from extremely thin floppy material. My gf said it looks and feels like a bathrobe, if that gives you an idea.  I am 5'11" 220 pounds of a slightly chunky but solid muscular build. After reading reviews I went with 2XL. It is JUST too small. Standing there it is fine, but it limits my movement too much.  If it were a better cut or had ANY stretch to it, it would have been great. But with the slender cut and zero stretch, it won't work.BUT, the fabric looks cool and the two pockets ARE real. So....I am exchanging it for a 3XL and making it work. Because it is still the best vampire/pirate jacket I have found. It is better than the $130 "Dracula Clothing" version.
Got this for my son as part of his Halloween costume. There are no button holes, but that is easily fixed. He has gotten so many compliments on this jack.

Had to immediately return item.  Unfortunately the size it said it was runs a lot smaller than advertised, or mine was marked wrong. According to the size charts on most items, i should be a 3xl. This was very disappointing cause I liked the design of the coat, but 4xl is the biggest this came in. Would say I would need a 6xl the way this fit me.

This is a great coat! Description and color (red) are accurate. Well made, great fabric that is a good weight, but not too heavy, nice details, and super price! Good fit, too, for a more slender build. I recommend sizing up if the gentleman has a fuller chest and arms. Buying several for a party. You will not be disappointed in this coat.

评论概述: Regrettably, the width of the jacket does not conform to the standard 5X size in the USA.
评论详情: Sorry team. The size of this product did not live up to expectations. The quality of the material is outstanding. Regrettably, the width of the jacket does not conform to the standard 5X size in the USA. The average size 5X should have a width of 60 inches at the chest and stomach levels. This coat is suitable for someone who wears a 3X size in the USA.

I love the material, the pattern is beautiful. The fit, now that's another story. I bought a man's size several sizes bigger. It doesn't overlap in the front, but the arm length is oversized. I can tailor that. But I call it my beatles jacket.
4xl should have fit me... no , this is more like a 3xl in the chest and a 4xl in the shoulders. Quality is meh. Going back for refund

I bought this to create a Colonial style outfit.  I already have a white one that everyone raves about.  I like this one as well and already plan on buying a red one and a blue one.  It's not historically accurate, but most folks have no clue about that.  I just need to create the illusion of an historical character.  These work very well.  They fit true to size from my experience.
Great value! As suggested by others I ordered 2 larger, but 1 larger may have been enough. Sleeves are a little long, but no big deal.
I bought this to play Severus Snape and I've used it again as a pirate costume.  I'm 6'4" and 260 and was pleased with the fit.  It looks really good and hasn't fallen apart over multiple uses.

After reading reviews on here I took the plunge and ordered one of these just to wear.. whenever hah! I enjoy wearing not so common clothing when going out so this fit the bill. Quality is nice! For the price point you get a nice (non-lined) Victorian/steampunk/pirate or any occasion jacket. Will it keep you warm on a 30deg night? Probably not, this is a costume piece but honestly, I'm going to wear it as a norm in this 70deg weather. As stated in numerous posts, the buttons are nonfunctional but not a big deal. Slits an easily be cut if needed, at least is has functional pockets. Ordering the white one now!

Quality is surprisingly good for a product of this kind. There is a lot of shaping sewn in. Fit is very small. I wear medium and I bought XL. It is just barely big enough, sleeves 4 inches too short! I'm making a custom garment so I don't care, but you might.
Fit well, looks good, but buttons do not have a way to button anywhere

3XL was way too small. Even though it said 3XL on the tag it was not. Just had measurements done for a wedding Tux, so I know what they are. Using their size chart, was a hoax. Would not recommend. BUY 2x bigger then what you think you'd need.

The truth is that the sizing chart is less then perfect. However: basing purchase on my shoulder size, I ordered the size that is 3 times my usual size in a store. Result: shoulders fit nicely, overall is good. Some areas a bit roomy, and upper chest snug. My dimensions are just at 5'10" 160lbs, lean-muscular build. Overall satisfied.
I bought this for a Halloween costume, and frankly, it's too good for that. Fits great and true to size (ladies, buy your size). I went as King Diamond (for those who know), and it was a winner.
I purchased this jacket as part of my renaissance pirate costume and have had a lot of comments that it is well made and very nice.

Great costume piece!

I did not care for the fit and returned it.  I would prefer a jacket with buttons.

I loved that vintage jacket it felt amazing. It was cozy and warm, the quality was top notch and the texture of the product was amazing—sadly the highest size was still not big enough to fit me. If the shop creates bigger sizes I’ll defiantly love another order.

I read the reviews before making my purchase. I bought 2 jackets. 1 for my son who wears a men's small/medium and is tall and slender. I bought him an XL, there is still some wiggle room for him and its a little big in his shoulders. But the length in the sleeve is just slightly long, but not huge. It fits well. For my fiance who wears a 2XL in jackets and XL in shirts. Stocky build and thicker middle. I bought him a 4XL just in case. It was pretty big. I would have liked a 3XL instead. It was just big everywhere, but ended up working out okay and not being an issue. It still looked nice and worked for his costume. I gave this 4 stars because: 1- the material is thin. In no way should you expect to wear this to actually keep warm. 2- The buttons don't actually function. It would be nice to have the option. Overall, beautiful jackets and worked for what they needed to. They can be used for multiple things and having functioning pockets was nice.

Bought for a halloween costume. Bought 2 sized up. My husband is 190 and 6'1.  He wears a Large shirt, but bought this in XXL. The sleeve was slightly long, but the overall fit was good and comfortable. The button are Faux, so just know that. Perfect for a pirate costume for the price.
My husband went as Nosferatu. We ordered big and it worked perfectly! Excellent value! Note: It washed up perfectly afterwards!
